Description: Fragment of flattened handle of a probably Rhodian pottery transport amphora, gradual curve. Clay near fine light pink-brown; white inclusions. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Pencil '3a'? Petrie noted several such stamps in his 1884-5 diary (EES Archive XVII 47).
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.0449)
